text: 'Had good coffee and and an awesome banana cake üòã! The lady at the counter is so warm and courteous- she offered another cake complimentary to try as well. Both cakes were awesome - with their freshly brewed coffee! Come over for a coffee with homely environment!'

author: Andrew G
text: "I love this place
column5: and as you can see from the other ratings
column6: I'm not the only one. It's the best coffee place in Hoboken (though the best coffee is at Hidden Grounds). Solid coffee and pastries
column7: a great atmosphere and great service
column8: the music is never too loud or obnoxious
column9: and there are usually plenty of seats. It's clean and well managed. You can accumulate loyalty points through both Square and their own loyalty card. The tables in the back are kind of cool

text: "Super cool place
column5: good vibes and good coffee! They have different kind of latte flavors like Roz matcha and cherries dark chocolate. I tried some of them and it's very good. Also they have good breads.\nThe base of the small tables inside are old swing machines so cool !! I order a cherry chocolate latte and I didn't know there is coffee in it
column6: and they made me a new drink with out charge me again it was very nice of them!"

author: Erin Bart
text: "Yummy coffee and treats. Good customer service and the seating area in the back looks cozy. I just carried mine out but I'll definitely go back the next time I want to stop and sit for a coffee."
